name: adc_ltm_monitor_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getLTMMonitorList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM monitor

    '''

    ltm_monitor_list = []
    adc_ltm_monitor_list = connect_db.appviewx.lm.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_monitor_list:
        ltm_monitor_list.append(device)
    return ltm_monitor_list
description: To get a list of LTM monitor
_keywords: To get a list of LTM monitor
